~!~FUNC~!~return (contentTitle) =>
  `Clear and interesting explanation of the topic "${contentTitle}". Illustrative examples, important properties, interesting facts, life applications, clear proofs. Here you will definitely understand the topic!`

~!~FUNC~!~return (contentTitle) =>
  `Summary of the topic "${contentTitle}": key definitions, theorems, properties and examples of their use. All the most important things in a concise form!`

~!~FUNC~!~return (contentTitle) =>
  `Various problems with hints and answers on the topic "${contentTitle}". Interesting conditions, hints and detailed solutions. Turn knowledge into a skill!`
This material is in development! It may change in the future and even contain errors!
This material is for learners with a high level of knowledge. It contains information that is not suitable for beginners!
This is an optional material is for learners who want to dive deeper and gain additional knowledge and context.
There is no royal way into this topic! You can only figure it out if you know the following topics:

# Target

{ #sampleParagraph }
Article sample paragraph.\
Some of includes target me!

# Scope: Current part

@include
    location: sampleParagraph
    resolved: true
    blocks: >-
        { #article|test/include|include:0zyxwv__article|test/include|include:0zyxwv
        }

        Article sample paragraph.\

        Some of includes target me!

# Scope: Current topic

@include
    location: practice|practiceParagraph
    resolved: true
    blocks: >-
        { #article|test/include|include:43210z__article|test/include|include:43210z
        }

        Practice sample paragraph.

# Scope: Global

@include
    location: article|test/include|sampleParagraph
    resolved: true
    error: >
        Include Traversal Error!


        Include "<~ article|test/include|sampleParagraph" is targeting non-existing
        unique "article|test/include/test/include|sampleParagraph"!


        at "<~ article|test/include|sampleParagraph" in
        "article|test/include|include:NMLKJI"

@include
    location: practice|test/include|practiceParagraph
    resolved: true
    error: >
        Include Traversal Error!


        Include "<~ practice|test/include|practiceParagraph" is targeting
        non-existing unique "practice|test/include/test/include|practiceParagraph"!


        at "<~ practice|test/include|practiceParagraph" in
        "article|test/include|include:zyxwvu"

# Aliases

~ sampleP sampleParagraph
~ globalSampleP article|test/link|sampleParagraph
~ practiceP practice|practiceParagraph
~ relativeSampleP article|~/link|sampleParagraph

@include
    location: ~sampleP
    resolved: true
    blocks: >-
        { #article|test/include|include:OPQRST__article|test/include|include:OPQRST
        }

        Article sample paragraph.\

        Some of includes target me!

@include
    location: ~globalSampleP
    resolved: true
    error: >
        Include Traversal Error!


        Include "<~ ~globalSampleP" is targeting non-existing unique
        "article|test/include/test/link|sampleParagraph"!


        at "<~ ~globalSampleP" in "article|test/include|include:rstuvw"

@include
    location: ~practiceP
    resolved: true
    blocks: >-
        { #article|test/include|include:RSTUVW__article|test/include|include:RSTUVW
        }

        Practice sample paragraph.

# Relative

@include
    location: article|~/link|sampleParagraph
    resolved: true
    blocks: >-
        {
        #article|test/include|include:RSTUVW-__article|test/include|include:RSTUVW-
        }

        Article sample paragraph.\

        Some of links target me!

@include
    location: practice|~/link|practiceParagraph
    resolved: true
    blocks: >-
        { #article|test/include|include:DEFGHI__article|test/include|include:DEFGHI
        }

        Practice sample paragraph.

# Alias + Relative

@include
    location: ~relativeSampleP
    resolved: true
    blocks: >-
        { #article|test/include|include:edcbaZ__article|test/include|include:edcbaZ
        }

        Article sample paragraph.\

        Some of links target me!

# "Link" inside "Include"

@include
    location: summary|pWithLinks
    resolved: true
    blocks: >-
        { #article|test/include|include:123456__article|test/include|include:123456
        }

        Current part context [link](summary|/test/include|summaryParagraph).\

        Global [link](summary|/test/include/test/include|summaryParagraph).\

        Relative [link](summary|/test/include|summaryParagraph).\

        Alias: Current part context [link](summary|/test/include|summaryParagraph).\

        Alias: Global [link](summary|/test/include/test/include|summaryParagraph).\

        Alias: Relative [link](summary|/test/include|summaryParagraph).\
